article.headline: Rice 84, Lamar 78
article.story: BEAUMONT, Texas (AP) -- Michael Harris scored 26 points and had 12 rebounds to lead Rice to an 84-78 victory over Lamar on Thursday night. Jason McKrieth added 18 points for Rice and Brock Gillespie had 10 points. Gil Goodrich had 17 points, including the last 15 of the game for Lamar. He also had seven assists. Terrell Petteway added 16 points and grabbed 14 rebounds and Teddy Davis scored 14 points. Raymond Anthony had 11 points and five assists. Rice (5-2) shot 47 percent from the field while Lamar (6-2) shot 41 percent from the floor. Rice outscored Lamar University in the paint 40-14.
